snippet.title: Gun threat shuts down Boronia road
snippet.content: AN attack where a man was threatened with a firearm has closed part of a major road in Melbourne's east this morning. The incident happened at Boronia overnight at an address on Boronia Rd. A man was assaulted and then threatened with the weapon, police said. Boronia Rd has been partially shut westbound between Scoresby and Dorset roads. Victoria Police spokeswoman Natalie Savino said: "Specialist units will shortly be attending and police are asking members of the public to avoid the area."
